title: Server problems?
body:
So for whatever reason everytime I jump into game my Ping jumps from what is a steady 29 which I get everytime I use to play, to now I jump from 75-125 now I live in Sydney and have checked with Optus my service provider and everything is okay on their end just wanting to know if there is a problem with the server or is anyone else experiencing this.

Note: This started happening last night out of the blue.

replies.body:
Bump.

I live in Sydney too and I'm on Telstra and I've checked with them as well, they said my internet is completely fine. 

My ping used to be 27 been happening since the 6.1 patch. The tech guy I spoke to also plays league and he reckons it's the league servers having trouble keeping up with the player demand but I don't know.
